member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.DataModel.CommerceEntity.CommercePropertyCollectionProxy
member.summary: Private class to CommerceEntity to handle the exposure of commerce property collection externally to the class.
member.remarks: This class depends on internals of , thus it must be a nested private class. expose property which is a projection of the property bag provided by . The current set of rules around what property bag properties are ExtensionProperties is highly expensive and needs to be optimized in future iterations. returns an reference. This implies a contract in which the consumer can add new properties to the collection. This contract dependency is used by some serializers (namingly Newtonsoft.JSON). This class is the one responsible to implement this contract and guarantee the business rules around exposing .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.DataModel.CommerceEntityDataLevel
member.summary: Represents the various levels of data which an entity can contain.
member.remarks: Observations: - Not all levels may apply to all entity types. - The exact information mapped to each level depends on the entity type. - The implicit data level also varies per entity type, and must be reviewed. - The implicit data level of the base class is Complete. - There isn't a 'None' data level, since every entity object instance must have an identity.
